/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a sense of being in the midst of the city's daily hustle and bustle. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape below.

On either side of the road, lush green trees stand tall, their leaves rustling in the unseen wind. They line the street, adding a touch of nature to the concrete jungle. The road itself is divided by a median, a common sight in many cities, guiding the flow of traffic.

Power lines crisscross above the road, a testament to the city's infrastructure. They stretch across the sky, connecting the buildings that dot the cityscape. Buildings of various sizes and shapes fill the background, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city.

In the distance, a highway overpass looms, a symbol of the city's constant growth and development. It stands as a testament to the city's infrastructure, a vital artery that connects different parts of the city.

The image is taken from a low angle, looking up towards the sky. This perspective gives a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene, making the viewer feel as if they are standing right there on the street, looking up at the city unfolding around them.
